96.eng-name: Holding Fast to the Qur'an and Sunnah

hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah:The best talk (speech) is Allah's Book 'Qur'an), and the best way is the way of Muhammad, and the worst matters are the heresies (those new things which are introduced into the religion); and whatever you have been promised will surely come to pass, and you cannot escape (it)

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِقْتِدَاءِ بِسُنَنِ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: Following the Sunna of the Prophet (ﷺ)
